DKDEPEND(DKSDLWindow)
IF(ANDROID)
	DKDEPEND(zlib-1.2.8)
ENDIF()
IF(NOT ANDROID)
	DKDEPEND(zlib-1.2.11)
ENDIF()
DKDEPEND(giflib-5.1.1)
DKDEPEND(libpng-1.7.0beta34)
IF(ANDROID)
	DKDEPEND(jpeg-6b)
ELSEIF(IOSSIM)
	DKDEPEND(jpeg-6b)
ELSE()
	DKDEPEND(libjpeg-turbo-1.5.3)
ENDIF()
IF(NOT MAC)
	DKDEPEND(tiff-4.0.3)
ENDIF()
## DKDEPEND(freetype-2.5.5)
